e-loan Learn more Sign up Already have an account ? Log in E-Loan Quickest, easiest and friendliest way to get a fast loan on your device!
Password Sign in Sign in "Welcome!" Not a valid username Password must be >5 characters "Login failed" Enter your phone number We will send you a text to verify your number Enter your phone number +254 SEND OTP You must enter your phone number Logo1 Enter the one time verification pin we sent you VERIFY OTP Please fill in your phone number Enter OTP code OTP verification failed, please try again Verification Failed, please try again. HELLO AND WELCOME TO E-LOAN Welcome to Easy loan. Our mobile loans are quick, easy to apply and do not accrue interest like other mobile loans in the market. Proceed to check your loan limit and borrow an unsecured loan within 5 minutes straight to your M-PESA ! Congratulations, you qualify for an initial loan of 2,000 kes ! check your limit To borrow your first loan, you are required to pay a processing fee of 100 kes.This fee will settle your interest, therefore, your loan will not attract any interest. You will pay back the exact amount loaned out to you. Isn\'t that awesome? Accept terms & pay fee TERMS AND CONDITIONS Logoo Cancel Phone number: Amount : KSH 100 OK>
